comments: Horrible teacher, his Powerpoints are horrible, they are all pictures of bugs and other things that he doesn\'t explain. DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS IF AT ALL POSSIBLE.

He struggles to keep the attention of the class. He spends too much time pacing and walking around, making it hard to pay attention. Must must must read the textbook, because class alone will not be enough. Smart man, but should not be teaching.

Porter was so much better as a teacher compared to Normack. Normack spends his time walking up and down the isles searching for someone to call out if he thinks they are using their phones or laptops for non class-related activities. For this reason he is useless. I\'m paying money to be taught and he spends his time rambling instead of teaching.

I can not stand this professor. He spends all of his class time looking for people texting as opposed to teaching and rants on about the most irrelevant garbage. If he put half the effort he puts into catching people texting into teaching, he\'d probably be substantially better.
worst teacher i ever had at umass. porter did a terrible job teacher the first half of the class but i would have loved to have him back after sitting through a few lectures with Normack.
He is the absolute worst of them all. The exams are impossible, and the students don\'t know whats going on. It seems like he is in his own little word when he speaks. A total loony.
